tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Advertising has become part of everyone's life. Some people say that advertising has a positive impact on our lives. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
